Memories of Wagner
Butlins, Pwllheli, North Wales Choice of Memories of Wagner or Poetic Fancies. Prizes 1st £20, 2nd £10, 3rd £5, 4th £5. 4 bands competed.
Feb. 22, 2013, 5:09 p.m. Sept. 19, 2016, 9:24 a.m.
1 Llanrug Band W. T. Davies
2 Wrexham Brass Caradoc Morris
3 Royal Oakeley Band H. Sutcliffe
4 Llanberis Silver Harry Heyes
